verses.1: Pasian aw, nangma itna kip om bangin kei hong hehpih inla, na hehpihna lian om bangin ka thu palsatnate hong phiatkhiatsak in.
verses.2: Ka khialhna panin hong silsiang kiuhkeuh inla, ka mawhna panin kei hong siangsak in.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka thupalsatnate ka thei a, ka mawhnate khempeuh ka phawk ngitnget hi.
verses.4: Nangma tungah khialin, nangma muhna ah a sia ka gamta khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin na thugenna ah nang na thutang a, thu na hong khenna ah pauna ding bangmah om lo hi.
verses.5: A khial sa mahin kei ka suak a, ka nu in a gil sungah hong paii tung a kipan a mawh sa ka hi hi.
verses.6: Nang in nuntakna sungah thumanna na deih hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka lungsim tawng ah ciimna hong hilh in.
verses.7: Puknah tawh hong nul in; kei ka siang ding hi. Hong sil in; vuk sangin ka ngo zaw ding hi.
verses.8: Lungdamna le kipahna kei tungah hong pia inla, na hong suk gawp mipa hong lungdamsak in.
verses.9: Ka mawhna khempeuh na mai panin seel inla, ka khialhna khempeuh hong phiatkhiatsak in.
verses.10: Pasian aw, keima sungah lungsim siangtho hong piangsak inla, a thak a man ngaihsutna ka sungah hong guan in.
verses.11: Nangma omna panin kei hong paai khia kei inla, keima kiang panin na kha siangtho la khia kei in.
verses.12: Nong hotkhiatna hangin hong lungdamsakkik inla, utna lungsim tawh keimah hong huh ta in.
verses.13: Tua ciangin thupalsatte na zia na tong ka hilh dinga, nangma lamah mimawhte hong kiheikik ding uh hi.
verses.14: Kei a hong hon Pasian aw, sih nading panin kei hong hon khia in. Nong hotkhiatna thu lungdam takin ka sa ding hi.
verses.15: Topa aw, ka pau theih nadingin kei hong huh in; nangmah kong phat ding hi.
verses.16: Bang hang hiam cih leh ganhing tawh biakna na deih kei hi. Meihal biakna hong pia hi taleng zong, na lungdam kei ding hi.
verses.17: Pasian º san theih biakna pen lungsim kitamzan ahi hi. Pasian aw, a kitamzan, a kisik lungsim na simmawh kei ding hi.
verses.18: Na lungkimna pha tawh Zion tungah a pha bawl inla, Jerusalem kulhpite ciangkik ta in.
verses.19: Tua ciangin biakpiakna man, meihal biakna le meihal biakpiakna bupah na lungkim dinga, na biakna tau tungah bawngtalte hong kipia ding hi.
